title: Is Wooxy and LoLProSkin Mod are allowed?
body:
Hey RIOT ,
Can i get a short answer about wooxy and lolproskin mod , it's allowed to use or not ? 
and Thanks <3

replies.body:
Short answer is that we don't support any third party programs, and using them is at your own risk.  

We wouldn't be able to offer support as a result of tehnical problems or malicious files that could be hidden within.  Also, while we might not ban for some programs right now that can always change.  Check out our[ third party guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848)for more info, and be wary.
